review.title: “Lessons Learned from one of the few startups involving a JV between a MNO and a Payment Acquirer”
review.pros: Pros – Huge potential of Growth - JV between the largest payments acquirer in Brazil and the biggest Telecom Group in the Country affording Scale, penetration, and awareness from the sinergy and convergence of both industries; and the partnership between the Largest Retail Bank and the 4th largest MNO in Brazil, providing huge potential of investments and ambitious business perspectives.Rewarding - unexplored new market with big potential of profitsCareer lever - Startup for Mobile Payments, providing unique expertise over the subject and the Brazilian MarketRewarding
review.cons: Cons – Risk - StartupsConflict of interests - Two industries x Two objectivesExecution Hurdles - High dependency of 3rd party systems and platformsbumpy - Startups shall correct their course or strategy on the go, which may be shake some nerves out of the most conservatives professionals
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – + Agility on remodeling the Business plan for the company as conflicting scenarios are a constant reality+Focus on Culture and Values to strengthen and foster higher teamwork
